pull.title: Add checks for settxfee reasonableness
pull.body: When using the `settxfee` RPC, the value is silently ignored if it is less than either than minrelaytxfee or the wallet's mintxfee. This adds an error response if that's going to happen, but still allows "settxfee 0" to deliberately default to the minimum value.

events.body: <!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->No more conflicts as of last run.
